properties.Name: CHERNOBYL-1 (CLOSED)
properties.Description:
PRIPYAT, UKRAINE

Total power output (operational reactors and reactors under construction): 800 MW
Details of reactor unit: CHERNOBYL-1
Reactor type: Light Water Graphite Reactor
Current status: Decommissioned
Constructed: 01 Mar, 1970
Connected to the electricity grid on: 26 Sep, 1977
Permanent Shutdown Date: 30 Nov, 1996
 
NOTE: Reactor 4 meltdown occurred 26 April 1986
 
Source of reactor data:  IAEA Power Reactor Information System (PRIS)
Get further information on this plant from its Wikipedia page.
